name: Red Walls
description:
Red Walls is a puzzle adventure game. You play as the Princess. When your carriage ride in surrounding the forest goes astray, you must venture through the different parts of the Kingdom to get back to the Castle.

Key Features

  • Puzzle solving: Work your way through puzzles to access different parts of the kingdom.
  • Exploration: Walk around the pixel art kingdom and explore the different areas.
  • Dialogue: Talk to characters in the puzzles and in the towns to find out the issues in the kingdom.
  • Single Player: Have a fun personal experience experiencing this kingdom.
